speakers.title: The Politics of Too Big To Fail
speakers.speaker: Andrew Ross Sorkin
speakers.text: New York Times columnist and author, Andrew Ross Sorkin, has been described as “the most famous financial journalist of his generation.” A leading voice on Wall Street and corporate America, his New York Times bestseller, Too Big to Fail: The Inside Story of How Wall Street and Washington Fought to Save the Financial Systemâ€”and Themselves, was the first true, behind-the-scenes, moment-by-moment account of how that financial crisis developed into a global tsunami.
